o6VRoFXrjVpeUUTc.hint: Elves range from under 5 feet to over 6 feet tall and tend toward slender builds, averaging around 110 pounds. Your size is Medium.

nAV5CNJSxNrNbCva.title: Heightened Senses
nAV5CNJSxNrNbCva.hint: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

description.value:
Your elf character has certain hereditary traits dictated by their lineage.

Age. Although elves reach physical maturity around age 20, mental and emotional faculties reach full maturity around the age of 100. Elves can live to be 750 years old.

@Embed[.Advancement.o6VRoFXrjVpeUUTc inline]{Size}

Speed. Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

@Embed[.Advancement.nAV5CNJSxNrNbCva inline]{Heightened Senses}

@Embed[Compendium.black-flag.lineages.Item.vbtLke61QI5NPFLO inline]{Magic Ancestry}

@Embed[Compendium.black-flag.lineages.Item.831o9gvKiBO70RpI inline]{Trance}
description.short: Elves are an ancient people, with ancestral ties to magic realms populated by immortal creatures.
